original_title: Mein Vater, mein Sohn und der Kilimandscharo
overview: Three generations, one desire, one mountain.  The story of a father and his son who hike through the wilderness of East Africa with Masai nomads and want to ascend to the snow-capped peak of Kilimanjaro.
tagline: About adventures and the happiness of traveling
title: Mein Vater, mein Sohn und der Kilimandscharo
